Text: Is this the Pilot? Or is the really first episode?
this should be episodes 1 and 2 since its the season premiere

Gabomagno:

Didn't download, but I assume its the pilot going by IMDB's TV Schedule:

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0799862/tvschedule

Should be S1, E0, not E1.

Episode 1 comes out Jan 29

Please...Stop posting rar files or GTFO! Secene groups use rar because they post to newsgroups. Rars have no useful purpose in torrents other than hiding cracks and patches from Anti-virus progs. All the other reason given for using rars ONLY APPLY TO NEWSGROUPS! Back when The Scene started, newsgroup servers restricted the size of attachment in messages and RAR was the only compression utility that would easily split large files.
Scene groups sever a useful purpose, but people who just take these rar files and post them as torrents just make more work for torrent users. Please UNRAR before you post.
